The recent George W. Bush drug leak brought these thoughts to mind. Let me first state that I have not used any drugs for several years and don't care to again. When a law is unjust or not socially accepted in many circles many people disregard it. Citing the fact that the last two presidents used illicit drugs as evidence, perhaps our country should decriminalize many drugs that are currently illegal. Perhaps this shows that regular citizens even upstanding citizens partake in substances which our culture and government have demonized. The violence associated with these drugs are generally not a result of the physical chemicals themselves but due to the fact that they are illegal and therefore their distribution is controlled by an unregulated criminal element.
